page.title: 03Industry in Killyleagh.
page.content: The Killyleagh{Flax Spinning Mill}has been a central feature of the town since it first started in a converted grain store in 1852. It helped the expansion of Killyleagh into a thriving town. Today it employs 224 workers, 170 of whom come from the Killyleagh area. The Mill produces Flax and cotton yarn which is exported by container all over the world. The Mill has a three shift system. The day shift puts in a 39 hour week, the evening shift a 21 to 22 hour week and the night shift a 40 hour week.
